languages.name: HolyC
questions: This languages designer was schizophrenic.
This language forces floats to always be the max size of 64Bits
This language is an improved version of C. Featuring e.g. default args at any position.
In this language, a simple string written in the code without anything else, will automatically get printed. E.G. "HI"=Print("HI").

This language was created to remove mathematical notation from a different language to make it easier to type.

languages.name: Haskell
questions: This language is purely functional.

This language is based on lambda-calculus.
In this language, only the parts of code needed for a resulted will be executed.

languages.name: JavaScript
questions: This websites dynamic content works thanks to it.
This language was developed in just 10 days.
